Howe Robinson Partners – S&P Dept.
From close/direct owners that we have acted extensively, we can develop her for sale:
" M.T. Alia " - (ex ' Kalia ')
DWT 5,771 on 5.69m Built 99 TUZLA GEMI
Flag MAI, Class DNV BV - SS 5/2022
L.O.A. 109.10m / Beam 16.00m / L.B.P. 99.80m / Depth 7.25m
G.T. 3,457 / N.T. 1,647
Alpha 8L28/32 2,666 BHP 775 RPM
13.00
Hull: Double Hull
IMO Class: II
Tanks: 13 / Capacity: 5,784 / Pumps: 3x465 cbm/h
Epoxy coated / StSt coiled at +60 °C
L.D.T. 1,866
The vessel is trading DPP, inspectable/deliverable in UAE, very prompt
Can guide with fixing.
Holding full documentation on hands.
Best Regards,
Howe Robinson Partners | Sale & Purchase
